cover.title: GraphiQL Project
cover.description: A playground/IDE for graphQL requests, final project for RSS React 2023 Q1 course

about.title: About Project
about.aboutApp: This is a GraphQl playground web app that provides a GraphQL interface available to authorized users after registration. Users land on a welcome page where they can sign in or sign up if they are not authorized. Authorized users are directed to the main page,which includes a GraphQL interface.
about.queries: The main page interface allows users to send GraphQL queries to
about.aboutApi: . It includes a request editor for composing queries, a variables editor for managing query variables, and a lazy-loaded documentation explorer, providing insights into the API's schema when a successful schema response is received.
about.aboutStyles: The app has a sticky header that changes color when scrolling and includes a sign-out button. It also supports localization in Russian and English. Authentication and authorization are handled using Firebase with email options. Client-side validation ensures secure input. The footer contains links to the author's GitHub profiles and the course reference.
about.overall: Overall, this project showcases a robust implementation of a GraphQL web app with key features for an enhanced user experience.
about.aboutCourse: This app is a final project for RS School React 2023 course where we learned more about React.js, Redux and testing. RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community.

devs.I'm a Frontend Engineer based in Warsaw,: I'm a Frontend Engineer based in Warsaw, Poland. I specialize in React, Redux, TypeScript, and JavaScript, creating web experiences that truly captivate users. I love solving problems and keeping up with the latest tech trends. Collaboration is important to me, as it brings fresh ideas and leads to great results. When I'm not coding, I explore the tech community for inspiration and to fuel my creative solutions.
devs.I'm a Frontend Developer with 1 year of: I'm a Frontend Developer with 1 year of experience, committed to delivering user-friendly solutions. Skilled in a range of web development technologies including TypeScript, React.js, REST API, Redux Toolkit and CSS/SCSS. Passionate about building web apps from scratch and enhancing existing ones. Always looking for opportunities to sharpen my skills. Based in Warsaw, Poland.
devs.I'm a Junior Frontend Developer from Czę: I'm a Junior Frontend Developer from Częstochowa (Poland) with a passion for creating engaging web experiences. I specialize in JS, TS, React.js, and Angular partly. I am open to new challenges and excited about the opportunity as a professional front-end developer.
